description:
A basic overview of the steps you need to take to fully optimize your Wordpress website for the search engines. This is a LITE version of the full Wordpress SEO Rocket course.

In this LITE course, I'll explain the basic Wordpress settings you'll need to get your Wordpress website moving in the right direction. You'll also learn which plugins will help you increase your traffic, and how to backup your website in case something goes wrong.

Last, you'll learn how to use Google's Webmaster Tools program to give Google a map of your website, making their discovery a lot easier.

If you just need the basics, this is your course!
title: Wordpress SEO Blastoff LITE
